item.title: Extra Giant Grinch Christmas Decorations Outdoor Yard Signs with Stakes Grinch Stealing Cindy Lou Who Whoville Sign with LED Lights for Xmas Garden Lawn Patio Decor VAG101
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Extra Large Size: 24 inches tall, amazing size, conspicuous and impressive.Package Included: 5 Pcs Christmas yard signs – Ginch, Whoville Pole, Cindy Lou Who, Max, Gift Box, Ginch and Whoville Pole are respectively composed of two pieces. Lovely and unique design is really suitable for Christmas decorations outdoor.Shining at Night: ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $45.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:32:51 UTC – Details)



Extra Large Size: 24 inches tall, amazing size, conspicuous and impressive.
Package Included: 5 Pcs Christmas yard signs – Ginch, Whoville Pole, Cindy Lou Who, Max, Gift Box, Ginch and Whoville Pole are respectively composed of two pieces. Lovely and unique design is really suitable for Christmas decorations outdoor.
Shining at Night: This Christmas yard sign comes with two 13ft long LED colorful light strings, can twining round the yard signs to emit brilliant lights at night. The battery box is not waterproof and needs to be shielded when used outdoors on rainy days, giving you a beautiful night.The string lights use 3 AA batteries, can last 60-100H.
High-Quality Material: This Grinch yard signs are made of thickened corrugated cardboard, which is waterproof and environmentally friendly.
Easy to Assemble: This Christmas lawn decorations kit contains 4Pcs 6’’ plastic stakes, 6Pcs 12’’ plastic stakes, 2Pcs H-shaped support. You only need to use short stake to assemble Ginch sign and Whoville Pole together, and then use H-shaped support to fix Ginch and Whoville Pole on the lawn. Cindy Lou Who, Max and Gift Box respectively use two 12 inch plastic stakes to insert on the lawn. It’s very easy to assemble the outdoor decoration for Christmas!
Various Applications: The Xmas yard sign go extremely well with the Christmas lawn and yard decorations. You may place them in your lawn to make your Christmas merry and leave your guests and family with fascinating and enduring holiday memories.
Customer Service: If you have any ideas or suggestions about our products and services, please contact us and rest assured that we will satisfy you.

Price: $45.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:32:51 UTC – Details)

Price: $89.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:12 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Features:

This inflatable Polar Bear includes built-in lighting for enhanced nighttime visibility that makes Inflatable models can also decorate your courtyard in the dark.

This blow up polar bear inflates in moments with built-in fan and deflates compactly for easy storage.The 2 ropes and 6 stakes in the package make it easy for you to fix the inflatable model on the ground.

Suitable for Christmas outdoor yard,door,lawn,Christmas indoor decorations,increasing the Christmas atmosphere.

Build-in LED Light

Super bright LED light and colorful design are the spotlight of your Chirstmas decorations. There are bright LED lights inside, This guy will really stand out and be visible even on the darkest night with his bright lights. If you like the design, this will be a good addition to your Christmas decoration!

Stable and Steady Enough

Don’t worry that the Christmas inflatables will fly away with the wind. It came with 6 ground nails and 2 ropes to hold in place if necessary. and built in sandbags. It is easy to stake down and seems fairly sturdy.

High Quality Durable Material

Made of high quality polyester fabric, which is strong, secure and durable material, not easy to tear, adds the perfect touch for Chirstmas! The Polar Bear inflatable is super easy to inflate, you will see It go from laying down to fully inflated within a couple of minutes. Taking it down is just as easy, simply unplug it and roll it up.

CHRISTMAS YARD DECORATION: Christmas inflatables, unique polar bear inflatable design, giant and cute polar bear gives suprise to children and adults. Let the children play next to the Christmas inflatables, add a different festive atmosphere to Christmas, special holiday check-in points, and enviable family certification photos, Polar bear inflatables are the best choice for holiday decoration
HIGH-QUALITY AND SAFE INFLATABLE PRODUCTS: Christmas decorations outdoor inflatable products, sturdy and durable fabric selection, after long-term testing to ensure continuous use of inflatable products, inflatable stitching is strict and not easy to leak, high-quality waterproof fabric, tear-resistant and good waterproof Safe to use when it rains.
Outdoor safety fixation & Easy Setup:Provided with 6 ground nail for better stability and setup outdoors conveniently even it’s a windy day.
Easy & Safe to Use: UL-certified adapters ensure safe charging; built-in LED lights ensure nighttime atmosphere; powerful fans are guaranteed to be fully charged within 1-2 minutes; fixed ropes, ground spikes and built-in sandbags ensure stable placement outdoors, not easy go with the wind.
SUITABLE SCENE: Christmas inflatables gifts that children will love, suitable for placing in courtyards, lawns, front doors, gardens, etc., celebrating festivals, party highlights, and attracting the attention of neighbors and passers-by.
